name: TuneLoop
description:
Fly through a musical maze of hazards (Sharp, Flat and Rest signs) while firing at notation to unlock all tracks and get out of the loop.  Challenge the loop in this musical shooter written for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow keys - Move the ship down/up/left/right (Inverted Y Axis)
  • Space/Left Mouse Button - Shoot to toggle the notes
